JumpScale.baselib.performancetrace package¶

Submodules¶

JumpScale.baselib.performancetrace.PerformanceTrace module¶

class JumpScale.baselib.performancetrace.PerformanceTrace.PerformanceTraceFactory[source]¶
profile(methodstatement, locals={}, globals={})[source]¶

create a wrapper method which has no args and then pass that wrapper method to this method as first arg method is passed as a string e.g. ‘listDirTest()’ it remove stats is False the path where the stats are will be returned make sure that whatever arguments used in the statement are passed to the globals

example:

import JumpScale.baselib.performancetrace do=j.tools.performancetrace.profile(‘test0b()’, globals=globals())
